CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Number_of_Risk_Records__c = 0, TEXT(WAW_Displaying_Risk_on_First_Contact__c) = 'Yes'), IMAGE('/resource/1576755487000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/32/help.png', 'Question Mark'), IF(Risk_Flag_Red__c > Risk_Flag_Amber__c, IMAGE('/resource/1576755487000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/32/flag_red.png', 'Red'), IF(Risk_Flag_Red__c < Risk_Flag_Amber__c, IMAGE('/resource/1576755487000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/32/flag_yellow.png', 'Amber'), IF(AND(ISNULL(Risk_Flag_Red__c), NOT(ISNULL(Risk_Flag_Amber__c))), IMAGE('/resource/1576755487000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/32/flag_yellow.png', 'Amber'), IF(AND(NOT(ISNULL(Risk_Flag_Red__c)), ISNULL(Risk_Flag_Amber__c)), IMAGE('/resource/1576755487000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/32/flag_red.png', 'Red'), NULL)))))
CustomField.label: Risk Flag
